name: Samurai white
description:
The idea of the game was inspired in a scen from samurai jack in which jack fights a shinobi shadow warrior so we decided to make a stealth/plataformer game where you hide in de light and fight against shadow ninjas.

We have 2 levels + "Tutorial" (and 1 inaccessible level) and a couch versus mode
For vs mode player 2 needs to use a controller.

The art was made by damian1ilin. The great music is from theraven.that.refused.to.sing I made everything else in unity and the sound in bfxr + Audacity.
